data.name: PageTitle
data.value: About

data.name: PageDescription
data.value: Learn about this .NET 9 demonstration application and its features

data.name: ApplicationTitle
data.value: .NET 9 Test Demo Application

data.name: IntroductionText
data.value: This is a comprehensive demonstration project showcasing modern .NET development practices, testing strategies, and ASP.NET Core Razor Pages implementation.

data.name: PurposeHeader
data.value: üéØ Purpose

data.name: PurposeText
data.value: This application serves as a learning and demonstration platform for .NET 9 and ASP.NET Core technologies, featuring multiple layers of testing and modern development practices.

data.name: FeaturesHeader
data.value: ‚ú® Key Features

data.name: MessageSystemFeature
data.value: Message Posting System - Add, view, and manage messages with real-time functionality

data.name: GitHubProfileFeature
data.value: GitHub Profile Explorer - Search and display GitHub user profiles

data.name: AuthenticationFeature
data.value: User Authentication & Authorization - Secure user management with ASP.NET Core Identity

data.name: MultilingualFeature
data.value: Multilingual Support - Available in English and Japanese

data.value: üõ†Ô∏è Technology Stack

data.name: IdentityTech

data.value: üß™ Testing Infrastructure

data.name: UnitTestsInfo
